dict.acceptation: 人口；全体居民；特定[生物]种群；[物]布居；

sent.orig: Which one of the cities you have visited has the largest population?
sent.trans: 在你游览过的城市中那个人口最多？(population)。

sent.orig: China's population of the salient characteristics of a large population base, rapid population growth.
sent.trans: 我国人口的突出特点是人口基数大，人口增长快。

sent.orig: China's population policy has two objectives: control of population growth and improvement in quality of population.
sent.trans: 控制人口增长数量和提高人口素质，是中国人口政策的两个方面。

sent.orig: Inspired by a population model author of the paper approaches the problem of laid-off population control.
sent.trans: 受有关人口模型启发，探讨下岗人口控制问题。

sent.orig: She says, different countries need different solutions on location and, environment, climate and population population needs.
sent.trans: 她说不同的国家基于不同的地理，环境，温度和人口需求需要不同的解决方式。
